job_url_or_text: Front Desk Agent - Madonna Inn San Luis Obispo. Full-time day shift position (7am-3pm). $22-25 per hour. We are seeking a reliable, professional front desk agent for our boutique hotel. Responsibilities include guest check-in/check-out, phone support, reservation management, and light administrative tasks. Must have strong computer skills, excellent communication, and a friendly demeanor. Experience in hospitality preferred but not required - we value reliability and customer service attitude. Benefits include health insurance, paid time off, and employee discounts.
